name: Pacific Knights
description:
Pacific Knights is an action-packed third person shooter that takes you to the Pacific battles of World War II. Play in 3 different modes at sea, air and gun, and defeat enemy units, save your crew from enemy air raids and recapture strategically important targets.

Pacific Knights is the brainchild of two 3D artists (Daniel Brück & Todor Vankov) who have joined forces to improve their Unreal Engine skills and gain experience in the game development pipeline. Therefore we created the majority of the assets and blueprints ourselves.

We hope that we could entertain you with our little project for a few minutes and would be very happy about your feedback.

Dodumentation : https://todorvankov.com/pacific-knights-2

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pacific_knights/

the system requirements are not yet final. Since this is an alpha version and has not yet been optimized we recommend a strong DX11 graphics card (Geforce 970 / Radeon RX 570 60@FHD - Geforce 1080 / Radeon RX Vega 56 60@WQHD)
